# pbkdf2 Provider

This is for using PBKDF2 for deriving keys.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    pbkdf2 = {
      source  = "change-engine/pbkdf2"
      version = "~> 0.1"
    }
  }
}
```
